Endotracheal intubation.context: Endotracheal intubation carried out by Dr. X.

Afrin.context: Afrin was instilled in both sides of the nose and allowed to take effect for a period of time.

Hypertrophic tonsils.context: The hypertrophic tonsils were then removed by the suction and snare.

Bleeding.context: Bleeding was minimal and controlled with packing followed by electrocautery followed by extensive additional irrigation.

Electrocautery.context: Bleeding was minimal and controlled with packing followed by electrocautery followed by extensive additional irrigation.

Adenoids hypertrophic.context: An inspection of the nasopharynx confirmed that the adenoids were in fact hypertrophic rubbery cryptic and obstructive.

Nasal endoscope.context: A nasal endoscope was used to identify the plexus of bleeding, which was predominantly on the left mid portion of the septum

Plexus of bleeding.context: A nasal endoscope was used to identify the plexus of bleeding, which was predominantly on the left mid portion of the septum

Broad superficial cauterization.context: that was controlled with broad superficial cauterization using a suction cautery device.

Xylocaine with epinephrine.context: An additional control was established by infiltrating slowly with a 1% Xylocaine with epinephrine around the perimeter of the bleeding site
